participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends. I like the weather when it's warm enough to walk on the beach, but not so warm that I get too hot. I am a self-motivated and reliable worker who is looking for a position where I can use my skills and experience to make a positive impact on the company. I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.background: I cherish my collection of Celtics memorabilia, but my most valued possession is my garden. I listen to the Beatles to lift my spirits. I want to learn how to identify the different types of birds that live in my area. I am a petsitter. My favorite animal is the honey bee because they are so important to our ecosystem.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
What are you up to today?
I am just working on some gardening projects. I love being outside in my garden!
That's awesome! I love gardening too. What are you growing this year?
I am growing a lot of different things this year, including tomatoes, peppers, carrots, and cucumbers.
That's great! I love tomatoes. I'm not very good at gardening, but I always try to grow some tomatoes.
You should try growing peppers! They're pretty easy to grow and they taste amazing.
Peppers are one of my favorite vegetables, so I will definitely try growing some this year.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do a great job.
Thanks! I hope so.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I like to go for walks on the beach, watch movies, and spend time with my pets.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going for walks on the beach too.
It's one of my favorite things to do.
Me too! It's so relaxing and peaceful.
Yes, it is. I also love to watch movies.
Me too! What are some of your favorite movies?
I like a lot of different types of movies, but I especially love comedies and action movies.
Me too! I love comedies because they always make me laugh.
Me too! And action movies are always so exciting.
Yes, they are! I love watching action movies with my friends.
Me too! They're always so much fun to watch with friends.
It's great to meet someone who shares so many of the same interests.
Yes, it is! It's always nice to meet someone who you can relate to.
I agree! We should definitely hang out sometime.
I would love that!
Great! I'll text you my number.
